summary: Tubi Study Reveals Streaming's Growing Role in Holiday Shopping (3 minute read) Streaming is now a major driver of holiday shopping. title: How to Get 50% Increase in Leads w/ 1 Line of Text
comment: Source: TLDR Newsletter, Date: 2025-10-31, Reading time: 13 minute read, Links: https://tracking.tldrnewsletter.com/CL0/https:%2F%2Fwww.growbo.com%2Fhow-testimonials-increase-form-submissions%2F%3Futm_source=tldrmarketing/1/0100019a39f14bc9-8bdb37f8-3c69-4416-9af7-95bef713b685-000000/Jq3rq-uEHMyQYTh2ZekSR6PtHMpLRathOP18pQu0mYg=429
summary: How to Get 50% Increase in Leads w/ 1 Line of Text (13 minute read) A top hospitality school increased lead form submissions by 50% by placing a single authentic testimonial directly above the inquiry form. The quote was short, specific, and paired with a real student photo. This small shift addressed user hesitation at the moment of decision. Rather than investing in a website redesign or new traffic sources, the team focused on trust-building where and when it mattered most to potential leads.

title: OpusClip
summary: OpusClip (Tool) OpusClip transforms long-form videos into viral-ready clips optimized for social media. It uses models like ClipAnything to automatically detect highlight moments, reframe videos for different platforms, add captions, and generate brand templates and b‑roll. The platform supports uploads from YouTube, Vimeo, Zoom, Twitch, and more, and offers both a free plan and a paid tier.

summary: Create on-brand marketing content for your business with Pomelli (2 minute read) Pomelli is a new AI tool from Google Labs and DeepMind designed to help small and mid-sized businesses generate consistent and branded content across social channels. It builds a Business DNA profile by analyzing your website, then produces tailored campaign ideas and editable creative assets. The tool is now available in beta across select English-speaking countries.
